description.en: Naughty Ghost that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ar: Naughty Ghost that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.br: Um fantasminha que segue seu mestre e coleta itens do chão.
description.cns: 顽皮小幽灵跟随它的主人并捡起周围掉落的物品。
description.de: Freches Gespenst, welches dir überall hin folgt und deine Items einsammelt.
description.fi: Naughty Ghost that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fil: Naughty Ghost that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.fr: invoque un fantôme farceur qui suit son maître et ramasse les objets laissés par les ennemis
description.id: Naughty Ghost yang setia mengikuti pemiliknya berkeliling dan mengambil item drop.
description.it: Naughty Ghost that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.jp: 幼いゴーストを召喚し、ドロップしたアイテムを拾ってくれる収集ペット
description.kr: 개구쟁이 유령을 소환하거나 해제합니다. 소환 하였을 시, 주변에 있는 아이템을 자동 습득하게 됩니다.
description.nl: Naughty Ghost that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.pl: Naughty Ghost that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.ru: Маленькое привидение, которое послушно летает за хозяином и подбирает предметы.
description.sp: Fantasma Travieso que sigue a su dueño y recoge los objetos soltados.
description.sw: Naughty Ghost that follows its owner around and picks up dropped items.
description.th: Naughty Ghostที่ตามเจ้าของไปรอบๆ และหยิบของที่หล่นลงมา
description.tw: 召喚或解除頑皮幽靈. 召喚時,將會自動撿取週邊的道具.
description.vi: Con ma nghịch ngợm đi theo chủ nhân của nó và nhặt các vật phẩm bị đánh rơi.
